task_list_en: Create a folder dir_1
Change directory to dir_1
Create a folder inner_dir_1
View the current directory
Inside dir_1, create an empty text file tf_1.txt
While inside dir_1, use the cat command to create a text file tf_2.txt with the following lines: - the first 1, - the second 2, - the third 3
Enter the inner_dir_1 folder
Use cat to create a text file tf_3.txt with any lines
Use cat to add the line 'the second 2' to the text file tf_3.txt
Use cat to add the line 'the sec 2' to the text file tf_3.txt
Use cat to add the line 'the sec 3' to the text file tf_2.txt
Use cat to add the line 'the SeCoNd 2' to the text file tf_3.txt
Use cat to add the line 'the seConD 2' to the text file tf_2.txt
Create a text file tf_4.txt with 15 lines.
Create a text file tF_5.txt with 13 lines.
List all files in the current folder.
Go back to the parent directory (from inner_dir_1 to dir_1)
Display the contents of the file tf_3.txt in the terminal.
Find the path to the file tf_4.txt
Clear the contents of the file tf_4.txt without deleting the file itself.
Find the paths of files with 'tf' in the name.
Find the paths of files with 'tf' in the name, ignoring case.
Find lines in files with the combination of letters 'sec' in the current folder.
Find lines in files with the combination of letters 'sec' (case-insensitive) in the current folder.
Find lines in files with only the combination of letters 'sec' in the current folder.
Find lines in files with only the combination of letters 'sec' (case-insensitive) in the current folder.
Find lines in files with the combination of letters 'second' in the current folder.
Find lines in files with the combination of letters 'second' (case-insensitive) in the current folder.
Find lines in files with the combination of letters 'second' in all subfolders.
Find only the path and filename in lines containing the combination of letters 'second' in the current folder.
Find all lines in all files where 'second' is not present.
Find only the filename and path of files where 'second' is not present.
Display the last 4 lines of any text file in the terminal.
Display the first 4 lines of any text file in the terminal.
One-liner command. Create a folder and create a text file with content.
One-liner command. Move text files containing the word 'sec' to any one folder.
One-liner command. Copy text files containing the word 'sec' to any one folder.
One-liner command. Find all lines with 'sec' in all text files, copy and paste these lines into a new text file.
One-liner command. Delete text files containing the word 'sec' in their content.
Simply print the string 'Good job!!' to the terminal.

Создать папку inner_dir_1

Находясь в папке dir_1 через команду cat создать текстовый файл tf_2.txt со следующими строками:- the first 1, - the second 2, - the third 3
Зайти в папку inner_dir_1
Через cat сделать текстовый файл tf_3.txt c любыми строками

Через cat добавить в текстовый файл tf_2.txt строку 'the sec 3'
Через cat добавить в текстовый файл tf_3.txt строку 'the SeCoNd 2'
Через cat добавить в текстовый файл tf_2.txt строку 'the seConD 2'

Вывести содержимое файла tf_3.txt в терминал.

Отчистить файл tf_4.txt от содержимого без удаления самого файла.

Найти путь к файлам у которых есть 'tf' в названии и буквы в любом регистре.

Команда в одну строку. Создать папку и создать текстовый файл с содержимым.

Команда в одну строку. Скопировать в любую одну папку текстовые файлы у которых в содержимом есть слово 'sec'

Просто вывести в терминал строку 'Good job!!'
